title: Pixel freezes and is unresponsive
content:
Hi,
My problem is Pixel freezing and being completely unresponsive

How it started
It started after it fell on the floor I think, at the beginning locking/unlocking the phone worked.

Problem description
At moments it's completely unresponsive, after restarting it I can't even type the PIN.
Double pressing power button and opening a camera helps at times. Or sometimes it still unfreezes after I lock/unlock it.
There are moments when it works perfectly for a minute or more. Full functionality. And then it freezes again. Sometimes rebooting it doesn't help, sometimes it does.

I did all the steps from 'Help'
I did a hard reset - it started freezing again when I was connecting to WiFi before I restored any backed up data ( I did not restore apps)
The power and sound buttons work fine
System is up to date

Any ideas how this can be fixed?
Thanks,
Wiktor
